name: Maybe I'm Just A Ground Hole
name_original: Maybe I'm Just A Ground Hole
description:
Maybe I'm Just A Ground Hole 

It's an arcade game where you are Just A Ground Hole which has to collect some stuff and avoid certain things within an amount of time. It combines a lot of interesting mechanics among with a relaxing gameplay.

If you want to know more then you should probably download it.

I mean, it's free. And all the needed explanations are included within it.

If i have to say something, i would say it's pretty philosophical.

Created by Fili7000
